meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or constituting an invitation.
meanings.sent1: The invitational card had elegant calligraphy.
meanings.sent3: The invitational message was so fancy, it made me feel like royalty.
meanings.sent4: Her invitational tone made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent5: The invitational design on the card was stunning.

meanings.definition: A tournament or competition in which participants are invited to compete.
meanings.sent1: The invitational drew top athletes from around the world.
meanings.sent2: She won first place in the invitational last year.
meanings.sent3: The invitational turned into a friendly game of tag.
meanings.sent4: The invitational was a battlefield of skills.
meanings.sent5: The invitational showcased the best talent in the region.
